stories.text:
I am looking for recommendations for a local cloud hosting provider in Sweden which has AWS AZ like data center setup, provides managed kubernetes clusters, has 99.95+ SLA. Managed database and managed message queue solution would be very nice addition. 64vCPU/128GB RAM (or higher specs) VM or host would be needed too.

Common searches return Bahnhof, Binero, Glesys, City Cloud, ElastX, Basefarm, Cygate. Do you have any experience with solutions from any of these companies? Would you recommend any one of them? Are there any hidden gems in Swedish market?

We don't need all 100+ service what AWS provides. Managed kubernetes, managed MySQL/ MariaDB, managed Rabbit MQ/ Artemis would be good enough.
stories.title: Ask HN: Local cloud hosting/ managed services provider in Sweden

stories.text:
Hi HN,

I remember a cool text editor project - it was a solo dev project with a free trial and a small subscription after that.

I can't remember the name of it though (ink something?) and the keywords I can remember make it impossible to search for. It had a really nice design.

I recall it being on HN a while back.

Not sure if that's enough to go on, but does anyone know what I'm talking about?
stories.title: Ask HN: Text Editor Solo Project by Japanese Dev
